Summary: 8-10, maybe more, spherical-shaped equi-distant pale yellow objects almost hovering in south/southeast sky until moving out of range (disappearing?)
divs: sighting detailstaken from email i sent to friends: [link moved to additional evidence section] hi all- in addition to the above stories, on july 4th, while riding my bike home from a friend's between 11:30\ 12am, i noticed some interesting lights in the sky. about 8 or so glowing, orangish, same -sized, very slow moving orbs almost hanging in the south\ southeast sky. i glanced over and saw other folks, in their yards and such, looking up at the lights too, so i pulled over and asked a few what they thought. the majority of responses hadn't a clue, but most had been watching for at least 10 minutes. i finished my ride home and hurriedly ushered my housemate, rob, outside to get a glimpse before they disappeared. a few were still 'hanging out', shimmering a bit, moving behind clouds and such, while the rest seemed to either vanish or simply move out of visual range. i stupidly remembered i had a camera in my bag, and quickly grabbed it to attempt some lame video footage (it looks ok, but nothing spectacular-- the best part about it was rob saying 'that's definitely some x-files ****'). we both pretty much wrote the experience off to '4th of july' antics by whomever-- maybe huge flares attached to weather balloons, or possibly even some type of military experiment\ or hoax? anyhow, the next day i decided to check out the local newspapers-- nothing, of course. upon scanning the internet, though, i quickly came across multiple stories of sightings from around the area-- including most of oregon and into washington. hmmm. a few days later, still no 'mainstream' news action, yet to my surprise many many more stories on the web from around the entire country-- same type of sightings described almost exactly, and around the exact same time of night (timezone differences not withstanding)! there are even reports from ontario and other parts of canada... crazy, right? further research shows that these sightings have continued to at least july 8th, and now this wild story about the chinese airport shutting down due to 'ufo' activity (including cool video footage), it really makes one wonder, no? just what is going on.... anyone else out there see anything besides the fireworks?
